name: docker-group
content:
import org.sonatype.nexus.blobstore.api.BlobStoreManager
def name='docker-group'
def members = ['docker-hub-proxy', 'docker-hosted']
if(!repository.getRepositoryManager().exists(name)) { repository.createDockerGroup(name, null, null, members, true, BlobStoreManager.DEFAULT_BLOBSTORE_NAME) }
